page.title: 07BLUE BELL INN RANSKILL
page.content: We came to the Blue Bell Inn on the first of November 1984.I was surprised to find the inside of the building was so large when it looked so small from the outside.The pub consisted of 4 rooms,the lounge,the snug,the public room and a games room.There was one bar to serve all these rooms.The toilets I found were outside across a yard.Our kitchen was behind the bar from which,we also found our lounge and a pantry.There was a door which led to the yard and the boiler room where our dog and cat were to sleep. Another door from the kitchen led upstairs to a long corridor with 6 doors,1 bathroom & toilet and 5 bedrooms.We soon got to know other people around the village.Soon the pub will be 'done up' because it is in quite a state!
